intro.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
intro.content:
SOFTWARE ENGINEERING 

Pursuing a Master degree of Science in Computer Engineering. Two years work experiences as Engineer. Seeking opportunities in Software Engineer

page.detail:
San Jose State University 

01/2016 - Current

• Master of Computer Engineering

TCL Research Research Assistant

10/2016 - Current

• Developed RESTful API in Python flask framework to provide services to parse natural language

• Prepared testing plan and test cases, including performance testing using Python line_profiler
• Tech stack: RESTful, Python, Flask, WebService, NLP

Data virtualization for ITS of San Francisco

09/2016 - 12/2016

• Developed a website to share real-time public transportation information of SF, including real time buslocation and speed, available bikes and empty docks 
• Used Google Maps API to provide map and route planner

• Tech stack: JavaScript, D3JS, heat map, Google Chart, Highcharts, Google Maps, JSON, AWS, Bootstrap, grunt

• Second prize of innovation contest, global scale, Ericsson China Ltd. 

02/2015
